channel.title: How do i do this rank problem?
channel.description:
ok i have a ddspeced source (shitty old delta)
and for ranks its
0= free member. 1= moderator 2=admin 3=owner 4= hidden admin
is there a way i can make it like this?
0= free member 1= donator 2= moderator 3= admin 4= owner
if there is a way please help? im clueless when it comes to this.

item.title: How do i do this rank problem?

item.description:
@k0_gawd_k0 wrote:

i still have no idea what to do lol.

item.title: How do i do this rank problem?
item.dc:creator: @Get_Forgotten Get_Forgotten
item.description:
@Get_Forgotten wrote:

I’m sure this is possible, But I think it would be more client sided doing with the crowns and icons etc…

And you’d have to change around commands so that a donator couldn’t ban people and so on

Read full topic
